features: KIND TO BABY: Experience baby wet wipes made with 100% plant-based materials designed for sensitive newborn & toddler skin. Our wipes are hypoallergenic, unscented, and 99% water to protect the next generation.
SOFT & ABSORBENT: Thoughtfully made with honest ingredients. We chose a plastic-free viscose fiber because it’s naturally hypoallergenic, absorbent, and soft on your baby’s skin.

VERSATILE & SAFE: Not just for diaper changes. Gentle enough for cleaning sticky hands or face. Convenient reusable peel-top dispenser for at home use or family travel. Multipurpose disposable wet wipes for daily use for parents, pets, and gentle cleaning.

PLANT-BASED & HYPOALLERGENIC: Our infant baby wipes are parent’s choice because they are non-toxic and are free of alcohol, chlorine, latex, perfumes, PVC, lotions, TBT, parabens, sulphates, & phthalates.
SINGLE PACK: Each individual pack contains 60 premium embossed baby wipes. Save when you buy in bulk. Perfect for travel or on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The wipes pull out of the pack easily.
reviews.reviewText: DYPER Baby Wipes | 99% Water Wipes | 100% Plant-Based | Hypoallergenic for Sensitive Skin | Honest Ingredients | Fragrance Free | Plastic-Free | Unscented | Single Pack, 60 WipesFirst impressions: Nice pack of wet wipes to clean baby messes. The wipes smell clean, more of soap than anything else. The wipes pull out of the pack easily.Installation/setup: Open pack and use to clean up messes without drying the skin..Final thoughts: Nice package of wet wipes. The wipes come out cleanly and easily and are plenty wet. They are soft to the skin and I didn’t have any reaction to the wipes. I like to keep baby wipes in my trunk in case of spills or messes.⭐️1 star - I don't recommend it at all, poor quality.⭐️⭐️ 2 stars - I don't recommend it, it has multiple faults, or a very high price.⭐️⭐️⭐️ 3 stars - It's passable, It has some faults but the quality is ok for what it is.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 4 stars - Product quite acceptable, it does what it promises.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 stars - Product that I totally recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EXPECT TO TRASH IT
reviews.reviewText: The company may be named DYPER…but I think the key ingredient here is HYPE(r). There’s nothing I can say about this product that isn’t already said in it’s product description. I’m not capable of verifying every point is true by means of laboratory testing, but as far as using my own body for testing…seems to check out?I don’t love how there’s talk about REDYPER on the packaging, yet no easy way to access what in the world that means. After further investigation, while a great start…it’s only available to 21 cities in the US. And at the cost of 20 bucks for each pickup…doesn’t seem like much incentive when you factor in the footprint of the process. I was hoping for a biodegradable product at the very least…but I understand there are many complications to that. I was JUST HOPING…anyway…I would use these on my baby, on my pets, and on myself on a regular basis if I desired a fragrance free, plant-based wipe. I took a star for how much extra work I had to take to find out what REDYPER is considering in the product picture, one of the slides is all about “Kind Disposal”.It’s a bit too selective to make it a selling point at this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This baby wipe is thicker, wetter, and sturdier than most wipes.To be honest, I got this as an adult because having baby wipes around is useful for quick cleanup, having something to wipe down a muddy dog paw when they are about to hop in the car, and more.However, I've used a lot of baby wipes with my nieces and changing diapers as a nicu nurse.This wipe seems larger and more texture than the common name brand wipes I was familiar with. While I haven't tested it on baby bottom with stuck on poo, this seems like it would do a better job than the smooth wipes. Don't get me wrong, this is very soft, but it's like the difference between the brown paper towels in a public restroom or using a name-brand thick quilted paper towel for soaking up water on the counter.I was pleasantly surprised by these wipes and look forward to having them around the house. I wouldn't hesitate to get a pack of these for a new mom or part of a baby shower gift.Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft Thick and Textured
reviews.reviewText: I use wipes in my mixed media art. They're used to remove excess pastes and paint, as well as for clean up.These wipes have all the qualities I'm looking for. They're nice and thick so they hold up well, requiring fewer wipes to do the job. They are soft, but don't leave lint behind like some other wipes I've tried. This is a huge plus for me, as I don't want flecks of lint showing up in my work. The embossed texture helps get into nooks and crannies, making them great for cleanup tasks.These wipes have the right amount of moisture to do the job, but not so much that they are drippy and wet.There are no fragrances added, and although I wouldn't say they're totally unscented, the smell is faint and not unpleasant. I have sensitive skin, so appreciate that they are plant based and hypoallergenic.As a side not they're made in the USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What's not to love?
reviews.reviewText: I don't know about the REDYPER program... seems like a lot of hype (advertising it on the product even) for limited availability, not to mention the fact that the program is likely considered a tax break for the company but they charge the consumer fees to use it, for that point I knocked off one star.As for the wipes themselves, these are checking the boxes in terms of being pliable, soft and efficient. Not a fan of the closure for them but they are an extra pack for the diaper bag. Overall a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and strong
reviews.reviewText: Good baby wipes. The wipes don't have any fragrances. I trust it has 99% water without adding unnecessary chemicals material. The wipes are strong and holding up very well, even for some “ tough” jobs. The only downside is sometimes I only one wipe one time it may come out with a few, causing some unnecessary waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice thick sheets!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these wipes primarily because they have no scent or fragrance to them. That means they’re great for sensitive areas! The thickness on the wipes is very good and they are sturdy and do not tear apart when in use. I love that these are water based, as chemicals and strong fragrances are just so irritating to those with sensitive skin. I’m really happy with this order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for puppies!
reviews.reviewText: I don't have human children but I use wipes for my puppy and senior dog. These are easy to dispense and 1 comes out at a time vs. several like other dispensers. The closure is not my favorite. They are gentle to use on my dog's paws and other areas as needed. They hold up well without tearing.
